casebody.data:
No. D-2580. In the Matter of Discipline of Craig Monard Hunt. 562 U.S. 1040, 131 S. Ct. 629,

178 L. Ed. 2d 457,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9013. November 15, 2010.

Craig Monard Hunt, of San Francisco, California, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable *458within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
